resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105913</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105913</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207067</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Hannah Arendt Papers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Hannah Arendt Papiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Papiers de Hannah Arendt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Papéis De Hannah Arendt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le Carte Da Hannah Arendt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Hannah Arendt Papers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Papeles De Hannah Arendt</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers selections from a writer whose work is one of the principal sources for the study of modern intellectual life. Selections include an essay on Arendt's intellectual history, a chronology of her life, and an index of all folders in the Arendt Papers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet Anwählungen von einem Verfasser an dessen 
Arbeit eine der allgemeinen Quellen für die Studie der modernen 
intellektuellen Lebensdauer ist. Anwählungen schließen einen 
Versuch auf Arendts intellektueller Geschichte, ein Chronologie ihrer 
Lebensdauer und einen Index aller Hefte in den Arendt Papieren ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre des sélections à partir d'un auteur dont le
travail est l'une des principales sources pour l'étude de la vie 
intellectuelle moderne. Les sélections incluent un essai sur 
l'histoire intellectuelle d'Arendt, une chronologie de sa vie, et un 
incrément de toutes les chemises dans le journal d'Arendt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece seleções de um escritor cujo o trabalho 
seja uma das fontes principais para o estudo da vida intelectual 
moderna. As seleções incluem um essay no history intelectual 
de Arendt, um chronology de sua vida, e um deslocamento predeterminado
de todos os dobradores nos papéis de Arendt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre le selezioni da un produttore di cui il 
lavoro è una delle sorgenti principali per lo studio su vita 
intellettuale moderna. Le selezioni includono un saggio su 
storia intellettuale del Arendt, una cronologia della sua vita e un 
indice di tutti i dispositivi di piegatura nelle carte da Arendt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει τις επιλογές από έναν συγγραφέα η ο οποίος
εργασία είναι μια από τις κύριες πηγές για τη μελέτη της 
σύγχρονης διανοητικής ζωής. Οι επιλογές περιλαμβάνουν ένα 
δοκίμιο στη διανοητική ιστορία Arendt, μια χρονολογία της ζωής
της, και ένα ευρετήριο όλων των γραμματοθηκών στα έγγραφα 
Arendt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece selecciones de un programa de escritura que 
trabajo sea una de las fuentes principales para el estudio de la vida 
intelectual moderna. Las selecciones incluyen un ensayo en la 
historia intelectual de Arendt, una cronología de su vida, y un 
índice de todas las carpetas en los papeles de Arendt.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207067</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105913</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-hannah-arendt-papers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
